summary: Defines a Qiskit gate class that implements uniformly controlled rotations about a chosen Pauli axis (X, Y, or Z). The gate applies a specific rotation angle conditioned on the binary state of a set of control qubits, extending the generic uniformly controlled gate infrastructure.
business_intent: Enable quantum algorithm developers to incorporate efficient, parameterized conditional Pauli rotations into circuits, facilitating the construction of advanced quantum operations and simplifying circuit design within the Qiskit framework.
